communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Illinois Freedom of Information Act., I hereby request the following records:

At the June 27, 2024 CPS Board Meeting, Board Member Michelle Morales indicated "As a joke, we were texting that maybe we should have Carolina solve our budget crisis..." The "we" she references in the Board Meeting refers to herself and other CPS Board Members.

Minute marker: 14:10, 
Public Board Meeting URL: https://www.cpsboe.org/meetings/meeting-videos/4368

Board members are using text message for discussion of public business.  Requesting all text messages between Board Member Michelle Morales and the following individuals, for the timeframe June 1, 2024 through June 30, 2024:

Board Member Jianan Shi
Board Member Elizabeth Todd Breland
Board Member Rudy Lozano
Board Member Tanya Woods
Board Member Mary Fahey Hughes
Board Member Mariela Estrada

It is my understanding that the Board of Education Board members are in a group text chat. Include any group chat texts in this response. This also includes any messages through WhatsApp, Signal, Slack, or any other text messaging apps.

Also note: This request seeks texts sent and received by board members whether they were sent on personal or CPS-issued cellphones or any other device.

Because this request is in the public interest for Illinois nonprofit The FOIA Bakery’s work to advocate for public education, please waive any fees in accordance with 5 ILCS § 140/6(c). Feel free to contact me with any questions, or if clarification is needed.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Miriam Bhimani
